alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lafayette; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette, north central Calhoun and west central Pontotoc Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tula, or 11 miles southeast of Oxford, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tula, Banner, Denmark, Randolph, Paris, Toccopola, Sarepta, Delay and Yocona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
